item.title: Jerusalem
item.description: This is the caption I wrote for an Instagram post about Jerusalem, when I visited it in July 2022. More about the trip can be read on a previous post âˆ’ Notes from Israel. Recently, I read it again and thought it was post-worthy, so here it is: To get lost in the beauty and the aesthetics of the Old City of Jerusalem, you won’t need to try or look closely.
